name: UFO: Unwanted Familiar Oddities
description:
Submission for the Brackeys 2020 game jam!

Get your students back on the bus by helping them out in our 2.5D adventure game. People hate aliens and it's time to go home make sure all your students have everything they need.

Fun Fact we planned to have 12 students, 4 side quests, and 3 zones. But having only one week made us have to narrow the scope by a ton! Hope you all enjoy it and don't forget to rate us!

Controls: WASD to move and E to interact

Artist/Character Designer: Chris

Programmer/Designer: Eddie

YT: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCVgbDBd2FhgnjJXPsNUMxRQ

TW: https://twitter.com/lilRainShades

Additional Assets and Music credits in the  game
